conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Arre welcome back folks! [laughs] Aaj mere saath hai cricket ki deewani, Ananya! Bol na, Mumbai Indians ke bare mein kya sochti ho?

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Arey Kabir, MI toh dil mein bass jaate hain! Matlab, 2013 se unka domination dekha hai na? Kya team hai, yaar!

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Haan yaar, aur wo 2019 ka final? Sahi mein heart attack ho jaata! Bas 1 run se jeete unka fourth title.

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: [laughs] Bilkul, dhadkan tej ho gayi thi! But yeh baat toh maan na padega, Rohit Sharma ki leadership toh kamaal ki thi!

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Sahi, bhai! Aur ab toh Hardik Pandya captain hain, Mahela Jayawardene as head coach! Kaafi solid combination lag raha hai.

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Bilkul, Pollard batting coach aur Lasith Malinga bowling coach! Experience toh on point hai. Ab dekhte hai IPL 2025 mein kya dhamaka karte hain.

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Mere hisaab se is saal bhi pakka trophy ghar hi aayegi. Wankhede ka maidan aur MI ka josh, dono kamaal hai!

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: [sighs] Ab dekhte hai. Fingers crossed! Bhai, MI ke saath rahoge toh surprises kabhi khatam nahi honge!

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Bilkul sahi bola! Aur isi note par, dosto sunte raho humara podcast for more such fun chats. Ananya, thanks for joining!

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Thanks Kabir! MI ke saath dil se ho ya na ho, hamesha dhamaka hoga! [laughs]
